Summary: I watched this for about 10mins, it seemed to stand sitll. then it was gone.
trends: there have been no other sightings in marina\salinas
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailswas on my way home from school. I looked up to the sky and it got my attention. I thought it was an airplain , but it was not moving and had no wings. my 2nd sighting was a few yrs. later. I was about 22 and it happened at about 3am. I saw some lights at the airport that did not look right. watched for several mins. I tried to use tolyprathe to make it come to me. when it started to move I got scared and moved to my apt. did not hear any sounds but I could see lights and the shape of it as it got closer. I beleave it had windows in front, with some kind of figure in the windows. as I unlocked my door and open it a fast moving opject flow out and I could feel it. It was ghostly gray and like a fog. I looked up and saw no stars and could feel something strange then it was gone and the stars reappered. I can draw them both if needed.
